body.name: Emergen-C Immune+ Immune Gummies, Vitamin D Plus 750 mg Vitamin C, Immune Support Dietary Supplement, Caffeine Free, Gluten Free, Raspberry Flavor - 45 Count
features: Includes 1 bottle of 45 Emergen-C Immune+ Vitamin Gummies in Raspberry flavor
Emerge Fortified with Vitamins C, D and Zinc (2) in a yummy, gummy vitamin
Support your immune system with 750mg of Vitamin C per serving, plus Vitamin D and Zinc (2)
Emergen-C gummies for adults are gluten-free and caffeine-free
Available in three delicious flavors: Super Orange, Raspberry, and Elderberry
Emergen-C Immune+ is also available in powder and chewable forms
Look for Emergen-C products from Haleon
body.description: Bite into Emergen-C Immune+ Gummies for delicious immune support (2) with more Vitamin C than 10 oranges (1). Emergen-C also contains B Vitamins and Antioxidants Zinc and Manganese. Of course, Emergen-C Immune+ Gummies are way more than great-tasting. They provide immune system support with an Enhanced Immune Support Formula (2). With 750 mg of Vitamin C in every serving, plus Vitamin D and Zinc (2), Emergen-C Gummies help support the immune system with every bite (2). A tasty addition to any wellness routine, these immune support gummies are made with natural fruit flavors and sweeteners, and they’re caffeine-free and gluten-free. Plus, they’re available in three delicious flavors – Super Orange, Raspberry, and Elderberry.The great taste and benefits of Emergen-C Immune+ are also available in powder and chewable forms. Emerge Your Best with Emergen-C Immune+ Gummies. (1) Based on using the USDA nutrient database value for a large, raw orange (2) These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Emerge Fortified Emergen-C Immune+ Gummies are packed with vitamins and antioxidants (1) that can help support your immune system*. (1) Vitamin C, Vitamin D and Zinc *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease Yummy Gummies Choose from a selection of naturally fruity flavors! Emergen-C Immune+ Gummies are available in delicious Super Orange, Raspberry and Elderberry flavors. Try them all! Naturally Good Emergen-C Immune+ Gummies are made with natural flavors and sweeteners, plus they’re caffeine-free and gluten-free.

Immune Support* Your Way Whether you go for gummies, choose chewables or prefer a refreshing drink mix, Emergen-C offers an immune support* form and flavor that’s right for you. Pair Up With Energy+ A great compliment to your daily gummies, Emergen-C Energy+ can help focus your mind and revitalize your body with natural caffeine from green tea*. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease Everyday Wellness Made Easy Made with natural fruit flavors and sweeteners, all Emergen-C products are as tasty as they are good for you. Make every day a delicious one with immune system support your body will love.

Emergen-C Original Formula Emergen-C Immune+ Emergen-C Energy+ Emergen-C Hydration Emergen-C Protein Fuel & Superfoods Benefits Provides daily immune support* with Vitamin C (1), plus other antioxidants (2), B Vitamins and electrolytes (1) Based on the USDA.gov nutrient database value for a large, raw orange (2) Zinc and Manganese An Enhanced Immune Support Formula* with key nutrients including Vitamin C, Vitamin D and Zinc Helps focus the mind and revitalize the body with natural caffeine from green tea* Replenishes and fortifies with key electrolytes and as much potassium as a banana (1) (1) Based on the USDA.gov nutrient database for a small, raw banana 15g of plant-based protein, plus organic superfoods and antioxidants. Protein plays a key role in providing the wholesome nourishment you need. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good vitamins. Good flavor. Works well .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was slamming these things down on a recent cruise to avoid catching any bugs. Came home healthy. Grateful they taste good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite Vitamin C!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Perhaps I’m an overgrown child but I love these!!! They’re tasty and I feel better when I take them regularly…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tasting gummie vitamin C
reviews.reviewText: Great tasting gummie that is easy to chew. Just wish there was less sugar in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product. I work in a school setting with all kinds of kids carrying all kinds of germs and I had one cold all last winter. I find these to be a bit overly sweet which led me to try several other brands that I didn't feel worked as well. My only concern and reason for giving a 4 star rating is that I have purchased these at Sam's club previously and saw them offered here at a better price and I could get just the raspberry ones. When they came the best by date wasn't on either of the 2 bottles that I bought and I found that a little suspicious..... the color looked a little off from the last of the ones I had.... maybe outdated?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest way to take vitamins
reviews.reviewText: We like this product. Easy to take and easily absorbed.
